name: Digicraft
tag_list: internet-consulting, social-networking, online-dating, advisory-services, product-development, conversions, traffic-driving
overview:
Digicraft has successfully helped a broad range of companies develop and execute successful marketing strategies, receive incredible media exposure, acquire new customers, identify and enter new markets, attract investment, identify lucrative partnerships, develop new products and much more.

We strive to augment traditional marketing and business consulting with a new breed of services based on a deep understanding of the forces driving the evolution of brands, community, conversations and discovery. Process.

We are comfortable collaborating with innovators and strategic thinkers, established brands and their agencies, entrepreneurs of all stripes, rogue internal change agents/social media types, investor-backed startups and the media. Clients.

We have built blog networks and award-winning websites, advised CMOâ€™s on revenue-producing social media strategies, provided gut-checks for investors, helped mainstream media understand emerging Internet business models, developed effective, clever marketing campaigns. Weâ€™ve even worked on brokering television commercials, the UI for a digital condo concierge, brokered the sale of a television commercial and performed market research in a pool in Vegas.
